body_html:
ok I'll leave the comment as-is for folks to see, but it's unfortunate that we receive a comment that's not helpful in any way.

Edit: for context, there was a troll with giant text comments and tagging multiple (unrelated) people in the order of "I have segfault, please help". They opened 2 issues and commented 4 times on this issue in the span of a few minutes. I reported the context to github, and they seemed to have banned the account.

body:
ok I'll leave the comment as-is for folks to see, but it's unfortunate that we receive a comment that's not helpful in any way.

Edit: for context, there was a troll with giant text comments and tagging multiple (unrelated) people in the order of "I have segfault, please help". They opened 2 issues and commented 4 times on this issue in the span of a few minutes. I reported the context to github, and they seemed to have banned the account.
